app_name: 0+ Lullaby Classic Music for Kids and Babies Relax
app_detail:
Make your baby sleep listening relaxing music.

Lullaby music app contains 12 baby songs and animals. 

• 12 lullaby songs
• Works in screen-off mode
• Android Auto supported
• Chromecast supported
• Volume control
• Material design
